attributes.action: help to get cctv in preston lancs cemetery
attributes.additional_details: we have a had numerous tries to get the local council to hear that cctv is needed in preston cemetery due to vandalism theft which affects everyone thats lost a loved one and had the privacy and lives affected by these crimes,cctv would help deter and indeed stop these crimes from happening.The loss of a loved one is hard to cope with,never mind the thought of someone abusing vandalising or stealing from a place where they should be left to rest in peace please help support us and get the council to admit that cctv is needed
